simplified: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

pronunciation.pinyin: shí jiàn shì jiǎn yàn zhēn lǐ de wéi yī biāo zhǔn
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: shi2 jian4 shi4 jian3 yan4 zhen1 li3 de5 wei2 yi1 biao1 zhun3

details.simplified: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准
details.traditional: 實踐是檢驗真理的唯一標準

meanings.value: Actual practice is the sole criterion for judging truth (item from Deng Xiaoping theory, from 1978)
